results.text: And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
results.reason: This verse highlights the divine peace that God provides, which surpasses human understanding.
results.reflection: True peace is found in God's presence and protection.

results.text: I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.
results.reason: Jesus promises peace amidst life's challenges, assuring His victory over the world.
results.reflection: Peace comes from trusting in Jesus despite life's difficulties.

results.text: You keep him in perfect peace whose mind is stayed on you, because he trusts in you.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes peace through steadfast trust in God.
results.reflection: Fixing our minds on God brings perfect peace.

results.text: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace. And be thankful.
results.reason: Paul encourages believers to let Christ's peace govern their hearts, fostering unity and gratitude.
results.reflection: Allow Christ's peace to guide your heart and relationships.

results.text: The LORD gives strength to his people; the LORD blesses his people with peace.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes that God is the source of both strength and peace for His people.
results.reflection: Receive strength and peace as blessings from the Lord.
